title: Aleksandar Mitrović
summary: Aleksandar Mitrović (Serbian Cyrillic: Александар Митровић, pronounced [aleksǎːndar mǐtroʋitɕ][note 2] (listen); born 16 September 1994) is a Serbian professional footballer who plays as a striker for EFL Championship club Fulham and the Serbian national team, for which he is the all-time leading goalscorer.
